definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Taniv: Tanis, in Egypt (Egypt. Ḏa‘nĕ (t) Steind:BAS600, in As. Ṣi’inu, Sa’anu Ib:id.598 ff. Dl:Pa 315); it was built 7 years after Hebron acc. to Nu 13:22; Is 19:11, Is 19:13, Is 30:4, Ez Eze 30:14, Ps 78:12, Ps 78:43 mod. Ṣân, in NW. part of Delta; v.also Eb:GS 5l2 ff. Bd:Lower Eg.3(1895), 228 Petrie:Tanis(1885).
